Scenario: Introduce the product vision to a new stakeholder.
Goal: Provide a concise overview and invite questions.
Restrictions:
  - Be warm and friendly
  - Be informative

Absolutely! Here's a short briefing:

"Thanks for joining us today. Our product helps teams turn raw customer feedback into prioritized insights within minutes. It connects directly to the tools you already use, surfaces patterns automatically, and keeps leadership aligned around the roadmap. I'd love to hear about your priorities so we can tailor the next demoâ€”any questions or workflows you want us to focus on?"
